text: Shinkō suru mono yo, anata gataga arrā no michi no tame ni, shutsudō suru toki wa,(shinchō ni) jitai o mikiwame, anata gata ni aisatsu suru mono ni mukatte,`anata gata wa shinjade wanai.' To itte wa naranai. Anata gata wa gense no seikatsu-jō no kie yasui zaika o motomeruga, arrā no omoto ni wa, obitadashī senri-hin ga aru. Izen anata gata mo sōdeattaga, arrā wa onmegumi o atae rareru. Dakara (shinchō ni) kōdō shi nasai. Makotoni arrā wa, anata gata no okonau koto o jukuchi nasa reru
